hasDitaContent.@value: Dexketoprofen causes bleeding, as can trastuzumab emtansine ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Dexketoprofen   causes   bleeding, as can   trastuzumab emtansine   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both dexketoprofen and treprostinil can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  dexketoprofen  and  treprostinil  can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasDitaContent.@value: Dexketoprofen increases the risk of gastrointestinal bleeding when given with triamcinolone. Manufacturer advises caution.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Dexketoprofen   increases   the risk of gastrointestinal bleeding when given with   triamcinolone .  Manufacturer advises caution .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both dexketoprofen and triamterene can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.

hasDitaContent.@value: Dexketoprofen causes bleeding, as can volanesorsen ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises avoid depending on platelet count—consult product literature.
